channel.title: Varrock V2
channel.description:
I loved Corey's city called Varrock so i made one to. Kinda same style but i think it's better.
[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=1&u=16426135][img]http://i22.servimg.com/u/f22/16/42/61/35/2011-010.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=2&u=16426135][img]http://i22.servimg.com/u/f22/16/42/61/35/2011-011.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=3&u=16426135][img]http://i22.servimg.com/u/f22/16/42/61/35/2011-012.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=4&u=16426135][img]http://i22.servimg.com/u/f22/16/42/61/35/2011-013.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=6&u=16426135][img]http://i22.servimg.com/u/f22/16/42/61/35/2011-015.jpg[/img][/url]
Rate/Hate/Mastrubate

item.title: Varrock V2
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Varrock is totally fixed (and i removed the ugly cobble tower in the center)
@B2300 T4nk, Look we both did the wrong thing, if i hadn’t destroyed your city they all would still be standing but if you hadn’t re logged it would be fine to.
Let’s start fresh again and forget this ever happened.
The town right in front of Varrock is fixed to and ill start working on the one next to me tomorrow.

I hope you accept my apology.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk

I know that I have did wrong and forgive me for my childness… And yes, I did quit. Have a nice life.

item.title: Varrock V2
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:28, topic:392548”]Also, it’s also your own fault for making an idiot OP, and for not taking the correct procedures to ensure peoples work was safe. But it looks like a nice varrock, but I’m not sure the wood was a good idea…[/quote]We trusted him. He blew up my Herobrine statue, changed all wood to stone in the spawn city and now this.
Guess only OP’s will be me tim and lon.

And the wood looks cool.

Read full topic

item.title: Varrock V2
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:25, topic:392548”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=489719.msg3583983#msg3583983 date=1304026651]
We use big brother but I still backup every single hour, why don’t you have a script set up to backup your world?
[/quote]We don;t have MySQL.[/quote]

so? big brother works with sqlite too which means you dont have to set anyting else up at all.

but the main thing is to back up everything every so often. use rdiff-backup or similar.

Read full topic

item.title: Varrock V2
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m curious, what are the specs of the machine you’re hosting this on? Is the machine specifically for hosting this server or are we talking about your laptop which you use.

Also, it’s also your own fault for making an idiot OP, and for not taking the correct procedures to ensure peoples work was safe. But it looks like a nice varrock, but I’m not sure the wood was a good idea…

Read full topic

item.title: Varrock V2
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

reyx7:

Oh. Very nice. You do realize you aren’t lighting proof though. It might b rare, but a bolt of lightning could ruin your day

Yes, yes it could. I logged onto my legit world today, went up the hill, and BOOM. First time I’ve seen lightning as well lmfao. I have a feeling soon, I will be struck at this rate.
image removed for new topic

Read full topic

item.title: Varrock V2
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:11, topic:392548”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=489719.msg3582065#msg3582065 date=1303871427]
Oh. Very nice. You do realize you aren’t lighting proof though. It might b rare, but a bolt of lightning could ruin your day
[/quote]

According to Minecraft Pro;

A lightning bolt will set fire to whatever it hits. The rain will, however, put out the flames soon afterwards.[/quote]I hope the rain will do it fast.

And how would i make it lighting proof then? And i don’t wonna make a glass roof above it.
